page.title: 02HOUSING SURVEY : AIRYHALL
page.content: Of twenty people interviewed, sixteen lived in semi-detached houses, one in a bungalow and one in a flat. They all liked living in Airyhall. Nineteen people got to the shopping centre at Mannofield. Eight go shopping about once a week, eight go shopping more than once a week, none go shopping monthly. Eight said the centre was very good and eight didn't like it. Four liked the bus service and eleven didn't. Seven used the library, two the post office, two the playgroup and three the clinic. One said more shops were needed and three said the buses could be improved. The most popular pastime was gardening followed by walking,walking the dog, golfing, bowling,old engines,sewing, reading, dress-making,music,visiting,fishing.
